name: North Delta Planning & Development District INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: North Delta Planning & Development District INC is a Respite Care provider based in Batesville, MS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $32.6M in Medicaid payments across 200K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $32.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
